snippet.title: Grayland Trailer - 2019 Google Play Indie Game Showcase Finalist
snippet.description:
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.OsOs.Grayland
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/grayland/id1469867856
1DER Discord: https://discord.com/invite/EjxkxaY
1DER Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1derent

A noir story in a unique action adventure!

Invasion or accident? Friendly or hostile? Find it out and find your way through the unique world of Grayland.

Grayland is a noir story of seeking your loved one captured by Humans. But are all humans evil? You find yourself in the middle of the war between the Human and the Alien forces. 

Will the Alien Invasion help your fight? Is everything really gray? Unlock the full game and unfold the whole story!

During the levels you face different enemies and continuously discover the puzzles of the story. 

Finding the balance of moving, eating and "shooting" is essential for survival.

Music is Braveness by Styve Bolduc licensed from premiumbeat.com



#PlayIndie
